Summary: Massive large Orb very bright white light glowing green aora
trends: There have been no other sightings in Gostilitsy
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were at a friends house with night vision to search for UFO's after a friend said he had seen one about 2 weeks prior, A massive white orb dropped from the sky, and slowed at just above tree top level, and appeared to land in a forrest about 2 miles from where he lives. At about 11pm I gave up looking and was putting my gear away, when my wife shouted quick look. I turned but it was too late I had missed it. She said she had seen the Biggest UFO she had ever seen a little bigger than the size of a good full moon. But this was only about a mile away, at tree top hight. She said it was massive, it passed behind the trees, from left to right as was a very bight white light with glowing green ora about it. As it was si low, it dissapeared before I could see it. BUGGER!! From her description, it was travelling in the same type of direction this other guy said he saw one a couple of weeks prior. I wonder if it's a regular landing area for them, very unpopulated and is dense forest and a small lake in this area.
